org.carrot2.text.suffixtrees2
Class GeneralizedSuffixTree<T extends BitSetNode>

java.lang.Object
  org.carrot2.text.suffixtrees2.SuffixTree<T>
      org.carrot2.text.suffixtrees2.GeneralizedSuffixTree<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<T>
public final class GeneralizedSuffixTree<T extends BitSetNode>
extends SuffixTree<T>

Implementation of a generalized suffix tree (a suffix tree that holds more than one sequence and remembers documents from which each suffix in the tree comes from).

The implementation uses the simplest of many possible techniques: it concatenates input sequences and inserts artificial delimiters between them.

Method Detail

build

public BitSetNode build(ISequence... sequences)
Create a generalized suffix tree for more than one sequence of elements. Sequences must return non-negative object codes because artificial sequence separators are negative and start from -1.
